typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Month_index as string,
		Predicted_PD as string,
		Year_Quarter as string,
		PD_Risk_Rating as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> single
single union(byName: true)~> combine
combine sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkdatalakeg2
